question: When will I be able to purchase an Kaitlyn Lilith watch?
answer: They are scheduled to be released by Christmas, but you may preorder them at our retailers beginning October 1st. See below for our list of retailers.

question: When can I get your special edition watch?
answer: The Special Anniversary watch will be available in 2023. A specific date has not been released, but we will update our social media channels with any news about our products. Follow us by clicking the links below.

question: Where can I purchase an Kaitlyn Lilith watch?
answer: Currently, our watches are only available at the online retailers below, but we plan to make them available at jewelry stores in the near future.
